column5: Danbo I don't think that knife would fit in the trunk of my 67 ford LOL.
It would take both of us to lift it!
But does it come with a sheath?  JF
It comes with a Knapsack to carry it!
Looks to me like a Sherpa would be better.  JF
where's the telescopic fishing rod? meh, not good enough, need more versatility
